mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) from qfeng_article a
RIGHT JOIN (select article_id from qfeng_ref_article_tag where tag = #{tag} where is_delete = 0) b on a.id = b.article_id
where a.is_delete =0 and a.is_publish =1

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.publish_time, a.front_content, a.backend_content, a.image, b.nickname as user, a.edition, a.create_time, a.modify_time FROM qfeng_article a LEFT JOIN qfeng_user b ON a.user=b.id WHERE a.is_delete =0 and a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.publish_time, b.nickname as user, c.visit_count, d.comme_count, e.like_count FROM qfeng_article a LEFT JOIN qfeng_user b ON a.user=b.id LEFT JOIN (select article_id, count(1) as visit_count from qfeng_visit_record group by article_id) c ON a.id=c.article_id LEFT JOIN (select article_id, count(1) as comme_count from qfeng_comment where is_delete = 0 group by article_id) d ON a.id = d.article_id LEFT JOIN (select article_id, count(1) as like_count from qfeng_like where is_delete = 0 group by article_id) e ON a.id = e.article_id WHERE a.is_publish = 1 and a.is_delete =0 and a.id = #{id}

SELECT e.rank FROM (SELECT id, (@rownum:=@rownum+1) AS rank from
(select a.id, a.publish_time,a.is_delete, a.is_publish from qfeng_article a RIGHT JOIN (select article_id from qfeng_ref_article_tag where tag = #{tag} where is_delete = 0) b on a.id = b.article_id ) c
(select a.id, a.publish_time,a.is_delete, a.is_publish from qfeng_article a) c
,(select (@rownum:=0) )d where c.is_delete =0 and c.is_publish =1 ORDER BY c.publish_time DESC ) e WHERE e.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qfeng_article (id, title, publish_time, edition, front_content, backend_content, user, create_time, modify_time, is_publish, profile) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, #{publishTime}, #{edition}, #{frontContent}, #{backendContent}, #{userId}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime}, #{publish}, #{profile})
mapper.delete: UPDATE qfeng_article SET is_delete=1 WHERE id =#{id}
